name: Souls Rescue roguelike
description:
Explore vast dungeons and release stolen souls.
Don't be shy, slay monsters!

  • random dungeons
  • turn based
  • 7 vivid environments
  • no magic but craft system to create your spell scrolls, potions and talismans
  • reagents a la Ultima 7
  • plant and harvest
  • buy pets and develop their skills
  • customize your weapon
  • die

Credit

  • Code and Pixels from BlackBones Family
  • Music created by Marty Opsahl, his soundcloud
  • Uses FNA github page

BlackBones Family represents our family, our true family, with Madame, Mister and children. Making game prototypes is our passion. Try to transform them to a well finished game is our dream! We are based under the sun of Switzerland.

Follow us on Twitter !
